summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing preparation of plans, specifications and estimates for and conditionally authorizing construction of facilities for a mobile home in the Wallingford Playfield to implement a proposed "Vandal Watch" program, superseding Ordinance 89715 to the extent inconsistent; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
committee: Parks and Public Grounds and Finance
